locations.name: The Crossroads Inn
locations.description: A famous inn where adventurers gather to share tales and find work. Located at the intersection of the King's Road and the Old Trade Way.
notes: A good place to hear rumors

locations.name: Silverdale
locations.description: A prosperous market town known for its silver mines and skilled craftsmen.

locations.name: Ironhold
locations.description: The capital city, seat of the High King. Massive walls protect its ancient streets.

npcs.name: Martha Goodbarrel
npcs.title: Innkeeper of the Crossroads
npcs.description: A stout halfling woman with a warm smile and sharp ears. She knows every rumor in the realm.
notes: Serves the best ale in the region

factions.name: The Adventurers Guild
factions.description: An organization that connects heroes with those in need. Posts bounties and quests at taverns throughout the realm.

factions.name: The Crown of Ironhold
factions.description: The royal government, led by High King Aldric III.

lore.title: The Shattering
lore.content: Three centuries ago, the Great Empire fell in a cataclysm known as The Shattering. The realm split into the kingdoms we know today, and strange magic seeped into the land.
